title: Prayer: How to Pray Effectively from the Science of Mind
description: Combining the most essential principles about prayer with the dozens of prayers and meditations from Ernest Holmes's classic text, The Science of Mind , this new book, Prayer , is a simple introduction for anyone who wants to learn how to pray effectively. "What does one do when he prays?" writes Holmes. "He talks to God. Where does he talk to God? He talks to God in his own mind, through his own thought or feeling."
author: Ernest Shurtleff Holmes
